rooms.description: Open and airy living space with Scandinavian minimalist design. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one side to maximize natural light.
Spacious open kitchen integrated with dining area. Minimalist cabinetry and modern appliances.
Cozy dining space adjacent to the kitchen with a glass partition for an airy feel.
Dedicated home office with ample natural light and built-in storage. Floor-to-ceiling windows for inspiration and view.
Spacious bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light and offer a view. Includes a dedicated balcony.
Smaller bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony. Designed for guest use or as a study.
Fully functional bathroom with modern fixtures. Accessible from the bedrooms.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed in a Scandinavian style, complementing minimalistic decor.
Balcony access from bedrooms to the spacious balcony area. Floor-to-ceiling glass doors ensure seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
A skylight installed in the living room for additional natural light, adhering to Vastu principles of air flow.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with expansive floor-to-ceiling windows and a large private balcony. Designed for ultimate comfort and natural lighting.
Guest bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and a balcony for fresh air. Minimalist design for maximum space.
Second bathroom on the first floor to serve guest and master rooms. Equipped with modern fixtures.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, ensuring smooth flow and adherence to Vastu guidelines.
